## Overview

This document specifies the complete unlock timeline for {GENRE} game progression. Unlocks are categorized into 5 waves that correspond to player progression stages.

**Design Principles**:
- **Regular cadence**: New unlock every 5-15 levels (target: {TARGET_CADENCE} levels)
- **Surprise mechanics**: Some unlocks slightly off-schedule to maintain unpredictability
- **Power spikes**: Major unlocks (bosses, prestige) at milestone levels (50, 100, 150, 200)
- **Tutorial pacing**: Dense unlocks in first 20 levels (rapid learning)
- **Endgame variety**: Slower but more impactful unlocks at high levels

---

## Unlock Waves

### Wave 1: Core Mechanics (Levels 1-20)

**Purpose**: Onboarding, teach fundamental gameplay
**Unlock Count**: {WAVE_1_COUNT}
**Average Cadence**: {WAVE_1_CADENCE} levels per unlock
**Player Stage**: Novice

| Level | Unlock Name | Type | Description |
|-------|-------------|------|-------------|
| 1 | {UNLOCK_1_NAME} | Mechanic | {UNLOCK_1_DESCRIPTION} |
| 2 | {UNLOCK_2_NAME} | Mechanic | {UNLOCK_2_DESCRIPTION} |
| 3 | {UNLOCK_3_NAME} | Mechanic | {UNLOCK_3_DESCRIPTION} |
| 5 | {UNLOCK_5_NAME} | Mechanic | {UNLOCK_5_DESCRIPTION} |
| 7 | {UNLOCK_7_NAME} | Feature | {UNLOCK_7_DESCRIPTION} |
| 10 | {UNLOCK_10_NAME} | System | {UNLOCK_10_DESCRIPTION} |
| 12 | {UNLOCK_12_NAME} | Mechanic | {UNLOCK_12_DESCRIPTION} |
| 15 | {UNLOCK_15_NAME} | Feature | {UNLOCK_15_DESCRIPTION} |
| 18 | {UNLOCK_18_NAME} | Mechanic | {UNLOCK_18_DESCRIPTION} |
| 20 | {UNLOCK_20_NAME} | Milestone | {UNLOCK_20_DESCRIPTION} |

**Wave 1 Highlights**:
- Level 1-3: Core mechanics introduction (swap, match, clear)
- Level 5-10: Basic gameplay loop established
- Level 10: First major feature unlock (e.g., power-up store)
- Level 15-20: Prepare for complexity increase
- Level 20: Wave 1 milestone (e.g., first themed world unlock)

---

**Wave 2 Highlights**:
- Level 25: First obstacles introduced (ice, crates, blockers)
- Level 30: Advanced mechanics (moving tiles, cascades)
- Level 35: Limited moves mode unlock
- Level 40: Time attack mode unlock
- Level 50: First boss battle / major milestone

---

**Wave 3 Highlights**:
- Level 55: Hammer (break 1 tile) — first tactical power-up
- Level 60: Shuffle (randomize board) — recovery power-up
- Level 70: Extra moves (+5 moves) — progression helper
- Level 80: Color bomb (clear all of 1 color) — strategic power-up
- Level 90: Lightning (clear row + column) — combo power-up
- Level 100: **PRESTIGE SYSTEM UNLOCK** — major meta-progression milestone

## Unlock Type Distribution

### By Type

| Type | Count | Percentage | Examples |
|------|-------|------------|----------|
| **Mechanic** | {MECHANIC_COUNT} | {MECHANIC_PERCENTAGE}% | Swap, Match-3, Cascades, Moving Tiles |
| **Power-Up** | {POWERUP_COUNT} | {POWERUP_PERCENTAGE}% | Hammer, Shuffle, Extra Moves, Color Bomb |
| **Obstacle** | {OBSTACLE_COUNT} | {OBSTACLE_PERCENTAGE}% | Ice, Crates, Blockers, Chains |
| **Feature** | {FEATURE_COUNT} | {FEATURE_PERCENTAGE}% | Daily Challenges, Leaderboards, Friends |
| **Mode** | {MODE_COUNT} | {MODE_PERCENTAGE}% | Limited Moves, Time Attack, Endless |
| **Meta-System** | {META_COUNT} | {META_PERCENTAGE}% | Prestige, Skill Tree, Account Leveling, Ascension |
| **Milestone** | {MILESTONE_COUNT} | {MILESTONE_PERCENTAGE}% | Boss Battles, World Unlocks, Achievement Tiers |

**Distribution Analysis**:
- **Mechanics** dominate Wave 1 (tutorial) — {WAVE_1_MECHANIC_PERCENTAGE}% of Wave 1 unlocks
- **Power-Ups** peak in Wave 3 — {WAVE_3_POWERUP_PERCENTAGE}% of Wave 3 unlocks
- **Meta-Systems** concentrated in Wave 4 — {WAVE_4_META_PERCENTAGE}% of Wave 4 unlocks
- **Milestones** evenly distributed — every 25 levels on average

**Wave Pacing Analysis**:
- Wave 1: Dense unlocks (avg {WAVE_1_CADENCE} levels) — rapid learning
- Wave 2: Moderate unlocks (avg {WAVE_2_CADENCE} levels) — complexity introduction
- Wave 3: Slower unlocks (avg {WAVE_3_CADENCE} levels) — power-up mastery
- Wave 4: Sparse unlocks (avg {WAVE_4_CADENCE} levels) — long-term systems
- Wave 5: Very sparse unlocks (avg {WAVE_5_CADENCE} levels) — mastery rewards

## Unlock Gap Analysis

### Gaps Between Unlocks

**Methodology**: Measure level distance between consecutive unlocks. Target: 5-15 levels.

| Gap Size | Count | Percentage | Status |
|----------|-------|------------|--------|
| **1-2 levels** | {GAP_1_2_COUNT} | {GAP_1_2_PERCENTAGE}% | ✅ Rapid (tutorial pacing) |
| **3-5 levels** | {GAP_3_5_COUNT} | {GAP_3_5_PERCENTAGE}% | ✅ Fast (core loop) |
| **6-10 levels** | {GAP_6_10_COUNT} | {GAP_6_10_PERCENTAGE}% | ✅ Optimal (balanced) |
| **11-15 levels** | {GAP_11_15_COUNT} | {GAP_11_15_PERCENTAGE}% | ✅ Acceptable (advanced) |
| **16-20 levels** | {GAP_16_20_COUNT} | {GAP_16_20_PERCENTAGE}% | ⚠️ Warning (near threshold) |
| **21+ levels** | {GAP_21_PLUS_COUNT} | {GAP_21_PLUS_PERCENTAGE}% | ❌ Violation (too sparse) |

**Target**: ≤5% of gaps exceed 15 levels
**Actual**: {GAP_VIOLATION_PERCENTAGE}%
**Status**: {GAP_VALIDATION_STATUS}

## Validation Results

### QG-PROGRESSION-004: Unlock Gate Pacing

**Quality Gate**: New mechanic/power-up/feature every 5-15 levels
**Threshold**: ≤5% of gaps exceed 15 levels
**Severity**: MEDIUM

#### Overall Statistics

| Metric | Value | Status |
|--------|-------|--------|
| **Total Unlocks** | {TOTAL_UNLOCKS} | - |
| **Total Gaps** | {TOTAL_GAPS} ({TOTAL_UNLOCKS} - 1) | - |
| **Gaps in Range (5-15)** | {GAPS_IN_RANGE}/{TOTAL_GAPS} ({GAPS_IN_RANGE_PERCENTAGE}%) | {GAPS_STATUS} |
| **Gaps Too Large (>15)** | {GAPS_TOO_LARGE}/{TOTAL_GAPS} ({GAPS_TOO_LARGE_PERCENTAGE}%) | {GAPS_LARGE_STATUS} |
| **Gaps Too Small (<5)** | {GAPS_TOO_SMALL}/{TOTAL_GAPS} ({GAPS_TOO_SMALL_PERCENTAGE}%) | {GAPS_SMALL_STATUS} |
| **Average Gap Size** | {AVG_GAP_SIZE} levels | {AVG_GAP_STATUS} |
| **Max Gap Size** | {MAX_GAP_SIZE} levels (Level {MAX_GAP_LEVEL}) | {MAX_GAP_STATUS} |
| **Min Gap Size** | {MIN_GAP_SIZE} levels (Level {MIN_GAP_LEVEL}) | {MIN_GAP_STATUS} |

**Target**: ≥90% in range 5-15 levels
**Status**: {QG_004_STATUS}

5. **Monitoring**: Track unlock engagement metrics (which unlocks drive retention?)
